subject: Soccer
Copa America (Soccer)
Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
Confederation of North, Central American and Caribbean Association Football (CONCACAF)
lead_paragraph: The tournament will celebrate its centennial by expanding to 16 teams, including six from Concacaf, and playing outside South America for the first time.
snippet: The tournament will celebrate its centennial by expanding to 16 teams, including six from Concacaf, and playing outside South America for the first time.
